title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A Next.js-based personal portfolio website that highlights my skills, projects, and achievements.

title: Booklio: Your Gateway to Buying and Selling Books
description: Buy and sell books effortlessly. Explore a wide collection and connect with book lovers worldwide.

title: Bachelor Thesis Project: Transformer Based 3D Hand Pose Estimation from Single RGB Images
description: Estimate accurate 3D hand poses from a single RGB image, tackling challenges like articulation, occlusion, and misalignment.

title: Brain Computer Interaction: EEG-Based Detection of Sleep Disorders Using ML
description: An EEG-PSG-based system utilizes ML to analyze sleep stages and detect sleep disorders efficiently.

title: CarciTrack: Genome Mutation-Based Cancer Identification Using DL
description: Identification of cancer based on genomic information that offers a new direction for disease diagnosis.

title: Computer Vision: Harris Corner-Based Feature Detection and Matching
description: Harris corner detection, SIFT descriptors, and feature matching implementation
